definition.text: Staking Power is the Token Power that goes into the Staking Program, and determines how much power you intend to stake.

translations.text: Staking Power - это сила токенов (Token Power), которая участвует в программе Staking Program и определяет, сколько силы вы собираетесь вложить в свой счет для хранения.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
